body: maglev/maglev-ir.h and maglev/maglev-ir.cc: nodes: LoadTaggedFieldForContextSlot, LoadTaggedFieldForScriptContextSlot, StoreScriptContextSlotWithWriteBarrier, CheckNotHole, ThrowReferenceErrorIfHole, ThrowSuperNotCalledIfHole, ThrowSuperAlreadyCalledIfNotHole, ConvertHoleToUndefined, HoleyFloat64IsHole. These nodes implement context slot load/store and TDZ (hole) checks; CheckNotHole and ThrowReferenceErrorIfHole generate deopt/throw behavior for TheHole. StoreScriptContextSlotWithWriteBarrier handles script context stores that may invalidate script-context-slot-dependent code via runtime invalidation.
explanation: Captures IR nodes and guard nodes associated with context slot access and TDZ handling; points to their definitions in maglev-ir.h/.cc and their codegen which emits deopt or throw behavior.
file_line: maglev/maglev-ir.h, maglev/maglev-ir.cc locations for CheckNotHole, ThrowReferenceErrorIfHole, LoadTaggedFieldForContextSlot, StoreScriptContextSlotWithWriteBarrier
